metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9387 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in the jpc_dec_process_siz function inlibjasper/jpc/jpc_dec.c in JasPer before 1.900.13 allows remote attackersto have unspecified impact via a crafted file, which triggers an assertionfailure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9387` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjasper-runtime - 1.900.1-14ubuntu3.5
libjasper1 - 1.900.1-14ubuntu3.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jasper package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.900.1-14ubuntu3.5').
